content.question: Jean-Jacques Rousseau differed significantly from other Enlightenment philosophes in his

choices.label: emphasis on emotions and his admiration for the "noble savage"
emphasis on the importance of science to social progress
belief in the divine right of kings

content.answer: emphasis on emotions and his admiration for the "noble savage"

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
